The Battle of Sauj Bulak (1918) was a major military engagement that took place in July of 1918 near present-day Mahabad in Iranian Azerbaijan, between the Assyrian volunteers led by Agha Petros against Ottoman and Kurdish troops under the command of Ali Ä°hsan Pasha. The Assyrians eventually emerged victorious, and Ottoman forces retreated to Rawandiz.
